titleStmt.title: The case of the tenants of the Mannor of Epworth in the isle of Axholm in the County of Lincoln. Truly stated in brief by Lieu. Col. John Lilburn, and others of the free-holders there, on purpose to inform every man in the justice and equity of their case. And to prevent the many mis-informations of M. John Gibbons, and the drainers, and their participants.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
